I wish for great riches

Granted. You are now the richest person in the world, at the cost of your family, friends, and sanity. You've now abandoned them and treated money as your god, and everything that will see you will think that you're already crazy. Oh - and it comes with another price of being a massive spender, spending all of your money to the most useless and expensive things that exist in this world.

Granted. The Sun cools down, and the Earth freezes over because of the lack of thermal energy.

I wish I had my very own working copy of Mir, in the same orbit as it was in real life. And nothing bad happened to it.

Granted. You are now stranded aboard your space station with no resupply missions. While you have enough food and water to last, the carbon dioxide levels are slowly rising, ultimately leading to your suffocation, while the station itself remains intact (nothing bad happened to it, but bad things happened to you).

I wish for a cure to this Andromeda strain thingy I contracted from that chocolate cake I ate before.

Granted, we hand you the cure in the form of the film from 1971. You watch it and find the cure. Unfortunately you allow the virus (or whatever it is) to spread, causing the organism to devour most of the planet.
